title: Mikan Enikki
synopsis: A kitten, abandoned and left for dead along with his siblings, is taken in by Tomu Kusanagi, who nurtures him and discovers that the tangerine cat he so adores is actually a genius who can talk, walk, read, and has even acquired a taste for liquor!
voices: ['Tarako', 'Hiramatsu, Akiko', 'Ikura, Kazue', 'Suzuki, Katsumi', 'Asami, Junko', 'Ishimori, Takkou', 'Cho', 'Kyouda, Hisako', 'Asami, Junko', 'Matsui, Naoko']
staff: [['Ishiguro, Noboru', ['Director']], ['Kitagawa, Masato', ['Episode Director']], ['Kusumi, Naoko', ['Episode Director']], ['Sato, Hiroaki', ['Storyboard']]]
